alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 2:08AM PST until December 09 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO NOON PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. Localized accumulations of 5 to 7 inches from the Deer Park area towards Priest Lake. Mountain accumulations 7 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Flowery Trail Road, Athol, Chewelah, Colville, Northport, Bonners Ferry, Eastport, Priest River, Newport, Springdale-Hunters Road, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Sandpoint, Kettle Falls, Deer Park, and Orin-Rice Road. * WHEN...From Noon today to Noon PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening and Friday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
